item.title: Learn HTML with Mozilla Thimble
item.description:
Although learning html has fallen out of fashion in recent years, I believe it is a skill that is important to know. Even if you'll never be a professional web developer, there are times when knowing a little html is beneficial. Today I stumbled across Mozilla Thimble.

It allows you …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins

item.title: #OhioITSCO Leadership Symposium - Teach Like a Hacker
item.description:
Why hack?

Teach like a hacker is the epitome of "work smarter, not harder". Figure out clever solutions to tough problems.

Coding

  • Using functions in spreadsheets (Managing your class list in a spreadsheet)
  • Codecademy (Check out the courses on Ruby and Python)
  • Scratch - Imagine, Program, Share
  • Interactive fiction
    • inkle » inklewriter …

item.title: #tlah Managing your class list in a spreadsheet, part 2
item.description:

Today, we will learn some more programming techniques in our quest to create another column in our spreadsheet which would have the students full …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins

item.title: Command line tool for Twitter
item.description:
sferik/t · GitHub

A command-line power tool for Twitter.

The CLI takes syntactic cues from the Twitter SMS commands, however it offers vastly more commands and capabilities than are available via SMS.

I have been using TTYtter: an interactive console text-based command-line Twitter client and Perl platform (whew!) but t …

item.title: #tlah Pancake hacking
item.description:
Last night we stayed at a Holiday Inn Express which offers a continental breakfast. My 9 year old daughter was fascinated with the automatic pancake maker.

Simple as can be, press OK and less than a minute later a pancake pops out. I was curious. What if I wanted more …

item.title: #tlah Getting started with virtualization using VirtualBox
